# Government Tender Announcement

## Project Title: Grounds Maintenance Services and Snow Clearing and Removal Services

### Reference and Solicitation Information

*   **Title:** Grounds Maintenance Services and Snow Clearing and Removal Services
*   **Reference Number:** cb-298-18892598
*   **Solicitation Number:** 1000255972
*   **Publication Date:** 2024-02-08
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-03-11 14:00:00

## Overview

Health Canada is seeking Proposals from qualified contractors for the provision of Grounds Maintenance Services and Snow Clearing and Removal Services at the National Microbiology Laboratory (NML) in Guelph, Ontario.

The scope of work includes:

*   Maintaining an approximately 8700 sq. metres of land area, including parking areas, sidewalks, walkways, and building entrances
*   Clearing and removing snow from designated areas

## Eligibility Criteria and Selection Process

*   Interested bidders must be qualified contractors with relevant experience in grounds maintenance and snow clearing/removal services
*   Proposals will be evaluated based on the Lowest Price Bidder criteria

## Important Dates
*   Amendment Date: 2024-03-11
*   Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-04-01
*   Expected Contract End Date: 2027-04-30
